name: Deep Dungeon of Oblivion
description:
Deep Dungeon of Oblivion (Unfunny_alpha version)

Die and retry to go deeper and deeper into the dungeon. Collect and discover a ton of gear, enemy, secrets and bosses ! To maybe... find the true exit.

Actual version : (Unfunny_alpha v0.1)

Why "unfunny" ? Because i only made the basic structure of the Game. So you can see the graphics, how it will play out and work. But there is not much for now, so it can be pretty repetitive.

But still ! Try it and break it ! Feel free to destroy my game in every way possible and tell me how you do it so i can patch it ! (I will probably add a list for all the people who helped me).
